chapter.text: Ate rata di jadom uha (dina te) cha jave
Tuhade raba ne tuhanu nahim chadi'a ate na uha tuhade tom bemukha ho'i'a hai
Ate nisacita rupa nala praloka tuhade la'i sasara tom bihatara hai
Ate jaladi hi alaha tuhanu devega. Phira tu satusata ho javega
Ki alaha ne tuhanu anatha nahim dekhi'a, phira usa ne tuhanu tikana dita
Ate tuhanu labhana vala dekhi'a, tam usa ne tuhanu raha dikha'i'a
Ate tuhanu dhana hina dekhi'a, tam tuhanu (dhana daulata nala) sapana kara dita
Tam tusim anatham te sakhati na karo
Ate tusim bhikhari'am nu na jhirakau
Ate tusim apane raba de upakaram di usatata karom
